com.stickycoding.Rokon.Menu
Class MenuObject

java.lang.Object
  com.stickycoding.Rokon.Menu.MenuObject
Direct Known Subclasses:
MenuButton, MenuImage, MenuToggle
public class MenuObject
extends java.lang.Object

The extendable class for which all objects added to Menu's are made from. Has a Sprite, Texture and Hotspot, the rest is done by extensions.

Author:
Richard
